tool_description: Interface with elements on the SteamCommunity.
name: Steam Community
title: Steam Community

api_list.name: Group Trending Topics
api_list.description: Get a list of the trending topics, and the OP.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-community.p.rapidapi.com/group/trendingtopics/l4d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-community.p.rapidapi.com/group/trendingtopics/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

trendingTopics.title: 2023 - Year of the Dead?
trendingTopics.creator: J4X
trendingTopics.contents:
Any and all survivors of dead chats, commune here!
Posted by: J4X, Jan 2 @ 3:07pm
Last post: J4X, Feb 14 @ 6:28pm

trendingTopics.title: Quien juega L4D2 para logros?
trendingTopics.creator: ♡  Glendy Lawliet  ♡
trendingTopics.contents:
Hola!, busco gente que le guste L4D y quiera jugar para sacar logros, de preferencia que sea de habla hispana porque mi inglés es algo malo xD
Posted by: ♡ Glendy Lawliet ♡, Sep 1, 2019 @ 5:55pm
Last post: Martín Vizcarra, Jan 10 @ 6:57pm

trendingTopics.title: Is this group still active?
trendingTopics.creator: Delta (EB)
trendingTopics.contents:
Hey guys, just wondering. Is this group still around? It doesn't look like it's been updated by the admins for a while.
Posted by: Delta (EB), Jul 26, 2020 @ 12:54pm
Last post: ᴀɢ, Jan 17 @ 11:57am

api_list.name: User Aliases
api_list.description: Get a list of user aliases and when they were changed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-community.p.rapidapi.com/user/aliases/sindex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-community.p.rapidapi.com/user/aliases/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: User Groups List
api_list.description: Get a listing of all the public and private groups a user is apart of.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-community.p.rapidapi.com/user/groups/sindex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-community.p.rapidapi.com/user/groups/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: User Friends List
api_list.description: Get a full listing of in-game, online, and offline friends of a user.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-community.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: User Profile
api_list.description: Get a full listing of data from a user profile. Friends, Groups, Steam Profile Level, and so much more.

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

Steam Replay 2022
Awarded for viewing your 2022 Steam Replay.

Community Contributor
